title: 帮忙写个papi的js
author: larsan
txt_content: 血量小数点烦，知道要用papi的js处理，可是完全不懂编程啊，哪位帮忙写一个提取血量整数

replies.author: GiNYAi
replies.txt_content:
自带的js实例里就有血量取整
health_rounded:
  expression: Math.round(%player_health%)
  type: string复制代码

replies.author: larsan
replies.txt_content:
GiNYAi 发表于 2018-4-8 19:39
自带的js实例里就有血量取整
复制过去，重启之后显示%javascript_health_rounded%，papi的javascript已经下载好了，你看看是什么问题？
example:
  file: example.js
  engine: nashorn
health_rounded:
  expression: Math.round(%player_health%)
  type: string
